  • Method Details

    • canMoveHere

      public static boolean canMoveHere(float x, float y, float width, float height, BufferedImage CollisionMap)
      Method used to check if an entity can move to a certain position.
      Parameters:
      x - x-coordinate of the entity.
      y - y-coordinate of the entity.
      width - width of the entity.
      height - height of the entity.
      CollisionMap - The collision map of the level.
      Returns:
      True if the entity can move to the position, false otherwise.

    • setPlayer

      public static void setPlayer(Player playerInstance)

    • isEntityOnFloor

      public static boolean isEntityOnFloor(Rectangle2D.Float hitBox, BufferedImage CollisionMap)
      Method used to check if an entity is on the floor or in the air.
      Parameters:
      hitBox - The hitbox of the entity.
      CollisionMap - The collision map of the level.
      Returns:
      True if the entity is on the floor, false otherwise.

    • isOnSameLevel
